p: In summary, ndhF, ycf1, matK + ycf1 and ndhF + ycf1 sequences are competent to develop species-specific barcodes to identify Orchidaceae plants at the molecular level. Cluster analysis using the ndhF, ycf1, matK + ycf1 and ndhF + ycf1 sequences in Orchid are nearly consistent with traditional plant morphology. Additionally, this study not only broadens the application of the matK and rbcL sequences in the barcode field, but also provides a novel thought to expand species identification method in a wide range of plant at the species level.
